name: test-weather-pipeline
description: A Dataflow Flex Template for processing weather data from Pub/Sub and GCS to BigQuery

parameters.name: bigquery_table
parameters.label: BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: The name of the BigQuery table to write the processed data

parameters.name: bigquery_dataset
parameters.label: BigQuery Dataset
parameters.helpText: The name of the BigQuery dataset where the table resides

parameters.name: input_subscription
parameters.label: Pub/Sub Input Subscription
parameters.helpText: The Pub/Sub subscription to receive messages from
